game_description: Immerse yourself in the relaxing power of nature and find your inner peace within contemplative landscapes carefully curated by scientists. Eascape is not a game. It is your new self-care tool that combines knowledge of neuroscience, landscape architecture and VR technology to give you the amazing opportunity to connect with nature right from the comfort of your own home. This is your calm place where you donâ€™t need to achieve any goals or perform any tasks. All you need to do is let yourself be present and mindful of the surroundings. Early access version features: Beautiful natural environment with relaxing & meditative properties Science-based selection of 4 contemplative views 3D full HD quality A complete immersive experience with natural sound Easy navigation & teleportation by sight
